messages.subject: Have a great weekend
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say bye.  WE are packing up and heading Disney for the weekend.  I guess I will be one of those people complaining about to much mail
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to say bye. WE are packing up and heading Disney for the
weekend. I guess I will be one of those people complaining about to
much mail overloading my computer..LOL!

Olga :)
Look forward to hearing from you on Tuesday, I will be spending the
weekend in one cabin with my SIL-special needs, very school-centered
teacher. You think maybe where we are sending Keiran to school next
year will not come up?? LOL..oh well
